hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT [LEVEL] as Value01 ,[SCNAME] as Value ,[KOD_T_ST] ,[SOCRNAME] as Id FROM [fias_SOCRBASE] WHERE [LEVEL] IN (7) AND [SCNAME] like :StartWith
SELECT [LEVEL] as Value01 ,[SCNAME] as Value ,[KOD_T_ST] ,[SOCRNAME] as Id FROM [fias_SOCRBASE] WHERE [LEVEL] IN (7) AND [SOCRNAME] = :Id
